title: Ko-So Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan, Italian, Japanese, Macrobiotic, Organic, Beer/Wine
description: Opened Nov 2013, this is modern, health food cafe offering a selection of puree soups, vegetable curry, salad with pancakes, pasta, fruits deserts, house made ginger drink, coffee, and alcoholic beverages. Reported to be 100% vegan and no longer using honey, Apr 2016. Last order one hour before closing.
